#summary Notes about XProc
#labels DC19

= XProc =

Workflow in the DC19 is carried out by scripts written in the W3C's XML Pipeline Language [http://www.w3.org/TR/xproc/ XProc]

== XProc Documentation ==

 * [http://www.w3.org/TR/xproc/ The language spec]
 * [http://xprocbook.com/book/book-1.html An online book (in draft stages)]
 * [http://tests.xproc.org/testsuite/ Test suite]

== Implementation ==

We are using [http://xmlcalabash.com/ XML Calabash] as our XProc interpreter. See the [Calabash] page on this wiki for details of installation.
